name: Halo of Arlyse
flavorText: Frostsmith Arlyse labored on the glacier for many months, seeking to harness the power of deep winter. In the spring, her tribe found her frozen corpse a short distance from her camp, holding this ring up to the heavens.
flavorTextHtml: Frostsmith Arlyse labored on the glacier for many months, seeking to harness the power of deep winter. In the spring, her tribe found her frozen corpse a short distance from her camp, holding this ring up to the heavens.

secondary.textHtml: Your Ice Armor now reduces damage from melee attacks by 50% and automatically casts Frost Nova whenever you take 10% of your Life in damage. (Wizard Only) [50 - 60]%
